SEARCH
Package application

Class Answers

java.lang.Object
application.Answers
public class Answers extends Object
The Answers class manages a collection of Answer objects. It supports loading all answers from the database, searching for specific answers, and managing the local list of answers.

  • Constructor Details

    • Answers

      public Answers()

  • Method Details

    • loadAllAnswers

      public void loadAllAnswers(DatabaseHelper dbHelper) throws SQLException
      Loads all answers from the database into the local list.
      Parameters:
      dbHelper - the DatabaseHelper instance providing the database connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an error occurs during database access.

    • searchAnswers

      public List<Answer> searchAnswers(String keyword)
      Searches for answers that contain the specified keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - the keyword to search for.
      Returns:
      a list of Answer objects whose content contains the keyword.

    • searchAnswersId

      public List<Answer> searchAnswersId(int id)

    • addAnswer

      public void addAnswer(Answer a)
      Adds an Answer to the local list. Note: This method only adds the answer to the list. To persist it in the database, call the create() method on the Answer object.
      Parameters:
      a - the Answer object to add.

    • removeAnswer

      public void removeAnswer(Answer a)
      Removes an Answer from the local list. Note: This method only removes the answer from the local list. To delete it from the database, call the delete() method on the Answer object.
      Parameters:
      a - the Answer object to remove.

    • getAnswerList

      public List<Answer> getAnswerList()
      Retrieves the local list of all loaded answers.
      Returns:
      the list of Answer objects.
